Dialogue.Page: Mod: Real Solar System Author: Trifid, MegaPiggy, and Xen
While RSS does exist on the mod database, it is only a preview of what is to come for this mod. It is still being worked on and story elements are planned for the full release.
Not much is commonly known of RSSâ€™s story as it is not mentioned on the mod page, but it is still a mod that has many (including myself) looking forward to the full release.
Even without the story elements, RSS is still a lot of fun to fly around. Getting to see our solar system in Outer Wilds in a neat experience, and well worth the download.
